section.p: A collection of like Encounters for multiple patients i.e. Group Therapy sessions. Note that each patient has its own Episode of Care.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the group encounter.

Contains at least one [1..*] encounter, where its type is Encounter Event
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner at a given location under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
Uniquely identifies the group encounter.

Contains at least one [1..*] encounter, where its type is Encounter Event
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner at a given location under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).
